definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她们都穿着最昂贵的衣服，留着长长的美丽的鬈发。

sentences.english: My original intention was to make clothing for amputees.
sentences.chinese: 我的初衷是给截肢者做衣服。

sentences.english: And as he prayed, the fashion of his countenance was altered, and his raiment was white and glistering.
sentences.chinese: 正祷告的时候，他的面貌就改变了，衣服洁白放光。

sentences.english: Look for scratching or fiddling with clothing.
sentences.chinese: 关注抓挠或拨弄衣服的动作。

sentences.english: Do you know how much you spend on clothes and groceries annually?
sentences.chinese: 你知道你每年要为衣服和杂货花费多少吗？

sentences.english: And as they cried out and threw off their garments, and cast dust into the air.
sentences.chinese: 他们遂喧哗呐喊，扔下衣服，并向空中扬土。

sentences.english: Put the clothes into the dryer when you get home.
sentences.chinese: 到家后就把衣服放进干衣机里。

sentences.english: She puts a big bundle of dirty clothes on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 她把一大捆脏衣服扔到柜台上。

sentences.english: This morning I went to the shop to change the coat I bought yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 今天早晨我去服装店调换我昨天在那买的一件衣服。

sentences.english: She gave us food and clothes and asked for nothing in return.
sentences.chinese: 她给了我们食物和衣服，没求任何回报。

sentences.english: The actress is dressed by the best-known designer in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 这位女明星的衣服是由巴黎最知名的设计师提供的。

sentences.english: Wear clothes that flatter and fit.
sentences.chinese: 穿着好看和合身的衣服。

sentences.english: Flap Horton: Does this mean you won't be knitting the baby any booties?
sentences.chinese: 这不会是意味着你不打算给婴儿做任何衣服？

sentences.english: Coal tar has a strong smell and can stain clothing.
sentences.chinese: 煤焦油有很强烈的气味，并且会染污衣服。

sentences.english: It took him quite some time to pick off the burs that had stuck to his coat.
sentences.chinese: 花了好长时间他才把粘在衣服上的刺摘掉。

sentences.english: He seemed to have no desire to go there; besides, his clothes were not good enough.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎不想去那儿，再加他的衣服也不够体面。

definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
